text.tspan: 2. Encrypt ephemeral keys with private keys
Am1 <- encrypt Alice(eph).pub to Bob from Alice
Bm1 <- encrypt Bob(eph).pub to Alice from Bob
5. Encrypt key parts with ephemeral keys and exchange them
Am2 <- encrypt Ak to Bob(eph) from Alice(eph)
Bm2 <- encrypt Bk to Alice(eph) from Bob(eph)
